response.quote: Those who do not understand true pain can never understand true peace
Things never go as planned in this curse world.

Becoming the Hokage doesn't mean people will acknowledge you.
But when people acknowledge you, you can become hokage.
Never forgot your friends!

However strong you become, never seek to bear everything alone.
If you do, failure is certain
Change is impossible in this fog of ignorance.

We do not know what kind of people we truly are until the moment before our deaths.
As death comes to embrace you, you will realize what you are.
That's what death is, don't you think?

True victory isn't against winning someone strong.
It's about defending what's important to you.

A teacher trains his students
But at the same time learns from them.
It is only through mutual respect and growth can foster a true teacher pupil relationship.
It is my sincere hope that each one of you will nurture such a relationship with your pupils.

Barriers! As you keep running into barriers,
You may abandon your will...
Make excuses and even replace it with hatred.
Listen closely, your will...
Never abandon it and always stride with pride!

People should talk to others every day.
Even if it's small talk
Otherwise, their heart will grow dark and serious
Talking to others builds bonds and makes you feel grateful that you are alive.
That's the kind of creatures we humans are.

In a real fight, there is no man or woman!
If you don't fight with your real power,
that will be the most shameful thing.

Cooking Is A Gift From The Gods.
Spices Are A Gift From The Devil.
Looks Like It Was A Little Too Spicy For You.

Don't have hate for this era you were born in...
Never forget the strength to be able to smile at any time...

That's ridiculous.
People usually have a stereotypical idea or an assumption like that and that's what creates a blind spot
The weaker person is the more he gets hung up on other people's pain and then he self-destructs

That's right!
Whatever the tragedy or the blunder is, only the things that actually happened are written in stone!

It may be hard right now... But you must silence those thoughts!
Stop counting only those things that you have lost!
What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this:
What is there... that still remains to you?
If you were to be troubled over something as trivial as losing face, then it's better to not have it at all.
Don't try to find a reason for somebody's love!!

Man or Child,
Strong or Weak,
None of those matters once you are out at sea!
If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn't have any in the first place.

Bring on the hardship.
It's preferred in a path of carnage.
Fools who don't respect the past are likely to repeat it.
Only those who have suffered long can see the light within the shadows

Destiny. Fate. Dreams.
These unstoppable ideas are held deep in the heart of man.
As long as there are people who seek freedom in this life, these things shall not vanish from the Earth.
Death is never an apology.

They are more like â€œpeople who donâ€™t follow rulesâ€¦â€
There are different kinds of people in different worlds!
â€¦ Between you two and them, what is the difference?
It isnâ€™t unusualâ€¦ to put it to an extremeâ€¦
A hero during a war would be just another murderer in peaceful times.
There are things you can't see unless you change your standing.
It is a sad truth that the greater the authority a person possesses, the more he tends to fear change.

Living is important! It is because one lives, one can enjoy things!
Everyone has their own designated place and position in life!
This man understands the futility of resisting against that fact!
You see, not all living things, are born equal!

There is no such thing as truth in this world.
That is our reality.
Anyone can become a God or a Devil.
All it takes is for someone to claim that to be the truth.

All the things I saw from my cage,
that was the whole world to me.
At first, all I could sense was the hostility of the people looking at me from outside...And their feelings of fear. Piercing gazes, hurled stones, whips, sticks...
Everything outside the cage was frightening, a source of pain...
But eventually, I began to realize something.
I began to see their other emotions, not just their hostility and fear of me.
They were the emotions of families, lovers, and friends who came to the sideshow...
Emotions meant for each other.

There are only so many lives I can value.
And...I decided who those people were six years ago.
So...You shouldn't try to ask for my pity.
Because right now,
I don't have...Time to spare or room in my heart.

We need to stop living for others.
From now on...Let's live for ourselves!!
Not all people in prison are criminals.
Humanity will never stop fighting itself.. until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer.
Those who don't fulfill their obligation to others have no right to ask 'em for the such privilege...
They don't know that once you lose something, you can never get it back again.
Just because you want other people to think of you as someone who'd literally die for another... dragging someone else to his death just for that... only a bad girl would do that, right?

Living this way is my way of getting revenge!! I'm going to be living proof that your fate isn't decided at birth!!
So what about you?
You're going to kill yourself, the ultimate act of submission. Is that how much you want to please the people who treated you like a nuisance?
Why are you trying to hurt yourself?
If your will is that strong... Then shouldn't you be able to change your fate?
Value your Life
Unless someone makes the first move, nothing will happen.

There is no heaven or hell.
No matter what you do while you're alive, everybody goes to the same place once you die.
Death is Equal.
In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.

Humans aren't made perfectly.
Everyone lies.
Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.

In this world, there is only good and evil, that was the first universal truth I grasped from observing the world around me when I was a child.
Every human being without exception ends up falling into one category or the other.
Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.

There Is No Heaven Or Hell.
No Matter What You Do While You're Alive, Everybody Goes To The Same Place Once You Die.
Death Is Equal.

I understood that killing people was a crime.
There was no other way! The world had to be fixed! A purpose given to me! Only I could do it.
Who else could have done it, and come this far? Would they have kept going?
The only one who can create a new world is me.
If you use your head, you won't get fat even if you eat sweets.

No matter how strong the power,
Its foundation is still steady accumulation.

No matter what you want to accomplish, it is necessary to have conviction and desire.
Those without it and those who are weak will be weeded out.
It's only natural.
The most inflated egos are often the most fragile.

The a slight difference between those who always aim for the top and those who don't...
It'll come to matter in a big way once you all emerge into society.

They've been exposed to the outside world, up close and personal.
They've had that fear planted in them.
And they've endured it.
Overcome it.
Each has grown from that experience... and forgotten how to hesitate.

Heroes and villains both thrive on violence, but we're still categorized.
"You're good." "You're evil."
That's how it is!! Symbol of peace?
Hah!!
In the end, you're just a tool for violence, made to keep us down! And violence only breeds more violence.
When there's nothing to be gained, rising to the challenge at those times... is surely the mark... of a true hero!!

Whether you win or lose...
You can always come out ahead by learning from the experience.

People... are not born equal.
That's the hard truth I learned at age four.
But that... was my first and last setback.
If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit remember what caused you to clench your fists... remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.

If you wanna stop this, then stand up!
Because I've got one thing to say to you.
Never forget who you want to become.
Some people have arbor ardor, but I'm more of a city kitty ya dig?
It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.
If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit remember for what cause you clench your fists... remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.
Whether you win or lose... You can always come out ahead by learning from the experience.
